Generated Narrative: ValueSet v3-ContextControlOverriding

Language: en

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ContextControl where concept is-a _ContextControlOverriding

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ContextControl
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _ContextControlOverridingContextControlOverridingThe association adds to the existing context associated with the Act, but replaces associations propagated from ancestor Acts whose typeCodes are the same or more specific.

name: ContextControlOverriding
title: ContextControlOverriding
description: The association adds to the existing context associated with the Act, but replaces associations propagated from ancestor Acts whose typeCodes are the same.
